Text:
Thanks again bbs. As post-first-year summer reading, this is like having a 201-level surrogate mentor which illustrates what you must know if you plan to segue comfortably into advanced studies later on.

For OCD types out there, this is a high quality .pdf derived from a .djvu. Crop it in Acrobat 9 (10 sucks) left/right by 15.875mm/.625in, max optimize, OCR, bookmark, and the resultant will be a 25MB file which should serve you well. 

Good stuff, bigbluesea.
